Reviews.Title: “the worst hotel ive ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: lindsey t
Reviews.Content: husband grandson stayed ramada maingate west 2 weeks inthat 2 weeks stayed staff uninterested saying rude fobbed booking charge 170 dollers hotel wasnt booking fee smelt damp bugs bathroom carpet dirty smelly couldnt shoes feet black sticking carpet window covered green moss holes round top window dust telly top stand beds ok pool un safe lifeguards times tiles pool loose food terrible choice

Reviews.AuthorLocation: West Palm Beach, Florida, United States
Reviews.Title: “Dirty, moldy, stale”
Reviews.Author: Sarah1117
Reviews.Content: notice entering smell chlorine feet none windows entire hotel fresh air chlorine moisture pool lingers makes breathing air unbearable family trip booked stank bad ammonia walked smelled strongly mold mildew sneezing fit walking lobby complain rudely told told phone fix true hospitality offered send maid inspect andor fix moved pristine larger complaints original clean buffet dinner hour 630pm terrible sad looking salad bar offered selection enchiladas dry spaghetti solely offered beef mexican food dry looking oil lifting bowl shredded cheese food sitting chlorine air settled onto food stench quality food hotel unbearable staff management ashamed themselves finding efforts acceptable mediocre barely covers commitment true hospitality dont stay options nearby meet floridas health codes

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”
Reviews.Author: RD0828
Reviews.Content: stayed spring break april daughter nice time nice tower roomwe disney fireworks night pool nice hotel shuttle disney crowded stops 3 hotels prepared stand squished clean plenty towels stay eat breakfast buffet pretty goodthere store lobby hotel sells disney review helps dont scared bad reviews nice hotel

Reviews.Title: “Worth the Money by far”
Reviews.Author: lndsymlne
Reviews.Content: ramada inn hotel keeping cool shower decent sleep gross horrible little dated otherwise cleaned top bottom self huge nice mirror sink actual bathroom sink mirror fridge iron plenty dresser space table chairs fairly quiet hotel cant expect 100 silence tourist city looking hotel sit day home free lobby clean comfy little gift shop breakfast buffet perfect cheap staff hour getting front desk gentleman called time nice wifi internet lounge 30 night 4 nights cant beat

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service from Front Desk Clerk to Managment”
Reviews.Author: jb264800
Reviews.Content: moment checkin frontdesk clerks hotel staff friendly curteous helpful food service staff excellent hotel restaurant lounge pizza hut express nightly karaoke entertainment near indoor pool provided enjoyment paired relaxation truly experience

HotelInfo.Name: Ramada Inn Kissimmee
